OOC: Sigh. The Rock has been shoved down my throat and out my ass. It hurts=
 to have to listen to him. RVD and Stone Cold are super talented, and Chris=
 Kanyon and DDP are so incredible that you'll go blind if you try to watch =
a match featuring that numb and dumb Matt Hardy. I don't rank wrestlers on =
their mic skills. No offense, Unitron, please don't take this personally, b=
ut are you a mark? I have friends who are marks...

  ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
  From: KSLawdogg@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Fr=
iday, August 17, 2001 10:00 PM
  Subject: Re: Cliffjumper & Strafe/Otyebis
=


  In a message dated 8/17/01 6:27:51 PM Pacific Daylight Time, 
  thecode=
@... writes:

  << OOC: And I suppose guys like Jericho, the Hardyz=
, and the Rock do have 
  talent just because they are booked to win all of=
 their matches. (Chokes the 
  hell out of the WWF. Turns around and chokes=
 the hell out of Test) >>

  (I recall many a match they have lost.  But no=
, all four of those WWF members 
  you listed would still talent even if th=
ey lost every match against the 
  'Alliance', coincidentally a name for tw=
o major evils IRL and IC :).  
  Alliance members have no talent, save the =
WWF superstars that went over to 
  it.  They pretty much have no charisma,=
 the WWF superstars do.  Tajiri alone 
  is more colorful than every WCW co=
mbined, save Booker T.  Booker T. has some, 
  but with moves like the spin=
erooni, to me, he's just a joke.  Especially 
  since he's copying the rock=
 bottom and giving it some name like the "book 
  in".  How the hell does B=
ooker come up with such lame names?  Good Leppard...

  Watching WCW on cab=
le, when it was on, caused me to fall asleep.  Good 
  Leppard, how it was =
boring.  Bringing in those wrestlers who did no 
  interesting moves.  The =
announcers were as irritating as Paul Heyman's voice. 
   The referees were=
 as bland as the WCW 'superstars'.  That's why it should've 
  been called =
"We Can't Wrestle".

  "Robert Van Dam is a rising athlete."  Sorry, but I =
don't like wrestlers 
  being shoved down my throat to try and make me like=
 them.  It's bad enough 
  his costume sucks, much like all of the WCW and =
its intros.  Heh, probably 
  the best fighter in the Alliance is Shane O'M=
ac and that's because he's WWF 
  material. 

  The Rock is the greatest wr=
estler ever.  He isn't shoved down people's 
  throats, he has more charism=
a than anyone, he's funny, and best of all, he's 
  got killer moves and co=
uld kick anyone's ass in real life.  I know someone 
  might say "the Rock =
is being crammed down my throat" so I just wanted to say 
  that.  Anyone w=
ho disagrees is just plain in the grip of idiocy.

  Has there ever been a =
good WCW coming over to the WWF?  Not really.  The 
  Radicalz? Nah.  Benoi=
t, Guerrero, and that fat guy who kept acting like a 
  Casa Nova, no.  Per=
ry Saturn...he's not a good wrestler but he's funny with 
  his insane act.=
  We needed someone to replace Al Snow in that department.

  ECW has had s=
everal good wrestlers come over.  Tazz, Rhyno, and the Dudley 
  Boyz.  But=
 the Alliance still sucks.  That's why the script had WWF 
  superstars go =
over there.  WCW losers fighting the WWF?  Ha!  Kane and 
  Undertaker coul=
d take 'em all out.  

  Booker T's been WCW champion five times?  Wow.  Ro=
ck's been WWF champion six 
  times.  And a WWF title is worth five WCW tit=
les.  I had an earlier 
  conversation about this over IM, wish I'd saved i=
t so I could just copy and 
  paste.)

  - L. Unitron    


   

  Your use=
 of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
